text: Edson Correia de Araujo, better known as Éder (São Paulo, 10 June 1988), is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a Defensive midfielder who plays for São Bento. ==Club career== ===Spartak Trnava=== Edson made his professional Fortuna Liga debut for Spartak TrnavaFC Spartak Trnava - FC DAC 1904 Dunajská Streda 24.07.2016, futbalnet.sk against DAC Dunajská Streda on 24 July 2016. ==References== ==External links== * FC Spartak Trnava official club profile * * Ogol profile * Futbalnet profile Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Spartak Trnava players Category:Slovak Super Liga players Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Slovakia Category:Expatriate footballers in Slovakia Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo Category:Rio Claro Futebol Clube players Category:Grêmio Novorizontino players
title: Edson Correia de Araujo
